Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration and evaluation, we believe this product is worth more than its face value due to its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship. We are offering you the opportunity to acquire this exceptional item at an exclusive price of $750000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
